p: We compared the rates of transitioning to salmonellosis under mean temperature and rainfall between 2004 and 2013 calculated using a method that incorporated the at-risk population structure as a final step at the end of the calculations with rates calculated using the more standard approach of incorporating the at-risk population in the regression models, as described by Alho and Spencer ( 2005), and found minimal differences in the rates (see Figure S2), indicating that the rates were acceptable.
